name: Cristina Bazgan
content: Cristina Bazgan Cristina Bazgan Professor at the Université Paris Dauphine, member of LAMSADE Junior member of the Institut Universitaire de France (2011-2016) Mailing address : LAMSADE, Université Paris-Dauphine Place du Maréchal de Lattre de Tassigny 75775 Paris Cedex 16, France office : P409 e-mail : bazgan@lamsade.dauphine.fr tel : 33 (0)1 44 05 40 90 Research interests Combinatorial optimization: exact and parameterized complexity, approximation Approximation of the set of efficient solutions for multiobjective problems Robustness Graph theory Boolean constraint satisfaction problems Teaching Publications Some talks Projects Member of the scientific committee of the University Paris-Dauphine (2012-2020) Member of the PSL's Academic Senate (2021-) Member of the CNU (2016-2023) Responsible of the second year of the program Business Intelligence of the Master "Computer Science" (2015- ) Director of the PhD Computer Science program of the Ecole Doctorale de Dauphine (2007-2014) Responsible of the first year of the program Decision of the Master "Computer Science" (2005-2012) Responsible of the seminar Combinatorial Optimization of LAMSADE (2000-2014) Co-chair of the conference IWOCA 2022 Co-organizer of the conference JGA 2016 Program committees WG 2022, CIAC 2021, WG 2020, CIAC 2019, IWOCA 2018, ICGT 2018, IWOCA 2017, ROADEF 2017, IPEC 2016, WG 2016, ICGT 2014, JGA 2013, WAOA 2012, FAW 2009, ISAAC 2008, FAW 2007, STACS 2007 Member of the PhD school committee of the University Paris-Dauphine (2007-2014)
